## Monthly Documentation Audit

### Version Sync
- [ ] SDK version in docs matches latest npm (`@sip-protocol/sdk`)
- [ ] Changelog reflects recent releases
- [ ] Roadmap progress is current

### Content Review
- [ ] All SDK exports have corresponding docs
- [ ] Code examples still compile and work
- [ ] No broken internal/external links

### New Features Check
- [ ] Check [SDK commits](https://github.com/sip-protocol/sip-protocol/commits/main) since last audit
- [ ] Check [Website commits](https://github.com/sip-protocol/sip-website/commits/main) since last audit

### Cross-Repo Sync
- [ ] TypeDoc reference matches SDK source
- [ ] Integration guides match actual implementations
- [ ] Security docs reflect current threat model

### Housekeeping
- [ ] Remove deprecated content
- [ ] Update dates where needed
- [ ] Archive outdated guides
